column1: NGR is Longdon Lodge. Altitudes match.
New gauge installed in 1944 50 yards East of Old Gauge and was given a different station no. i.e. suffix added.
1940s record has an NGR of SK066133, which is the Grand Lodge to Beau Desert Park but this is in a light pencil and there is a note "unlocated".
The observer, F J Dixon, lived at Longdon Lodge.
